doc.title: King of Rain
doc.plot: "What if you could see the Murderer through the victims eye's, What if from that moment on she owned your soul." Hale seers, he is neither phycic nor a profiler, has the ability to see into the minds of those who have recently been murdered. Through the use of Cellular transferance, he can see the final moments of the victims life. He is on the path of a brutal serial killer. When he is convinced to try and solve the brutal murder of a woman over seven years ago. He doesn't get the final moments of her life, but instead "EVERYTHING."
